sqlMap.select: SELECT CASE WHEN RF.UROLKY IS NULL THEN 'SYSTEM_M0086' WHEN MF.MENUKY IS NULL THEN 'SYSTEM_M0090' ELSE 'OK' END AS MSG FROM ( $VALIDATION_SQL$ ) STD LEFT OUTER JOIN ROLDF RF ON RF.UROLKY = STD.UROLKY LEFT OUTER JOIN MNUDF MF ON MF.MENUKY = STD.MENUKY WHERE (STD.UROLKY != ' ' AND STD.MENUKY != ' ') OR (STD.UROLKY != ' ' AND RF.UROLKY IS NULL) OR (STD.MENUKY != ' ' AND MF.MENUKY IS NULL)

SELECT CASE WHEN WH.WAREKY IS NULL THEN 'VALID_M0201' || ' ' || STD.WAREKY ELSE 'OK' END AS MSG FROM ( $VALIDATION_SQL$ ) STD LEFT OUTER JOIN WAHMA WH ON WH.WAREKY = STD.WAREKY WHERE WH.WAREKY IS NULL

SELECT CASE WHEN PG.PROGID IS NULL THEN 'MASTER_M0033' || ' ' || STD.PROGID ELSE 'OK' END AS MSG FROM ( $VALIDATION_SQL$ ) STD LEFT OUTER JOIN PROGM PG ON PG.PROGID = STD.PROGID WHERE PG.PROGID IS NULL

SELECT CASE WHEN US.USERID IS NULL THEN 'MASTER_M0003' || ' ' || STD.USERID ELSE 'OK' END AS MSG FROM ( $VALIDATION_SQL$ ) STD LEFT OUTER JOIN USRMA US ON US.USERID = STD.USERID WHERE US.USERID IS NULL
SELECT WAREKY AS VALUE_COL, NAME02 AS TEXT_COL FROM WAHMA
SELECT CMCDVL AS VALUE_COL , CDESC1 AS TEXT_COL FROM CMCDV WHERE CMCDKY = 'NATNKY'
SELECT CMCDVL AS VALUE_COL , CDESC1 AS TEXT_COL FROM CMCDV WHERE CMCDKY = 'LANGKY'
SELECT CMCDVL AS VALUE_COL , CDESC1 AS TEXT_COL FROM CMCDV WHERE CMCDKY = 'DATEFM'
SELECT CMCDVL AS VALUE_COL , CDESC1 AS TEXT_COL FROM CMCDV WHERE CMCDKY = 'DATEDL'
SELECT CMCDVL AS VALUE_COL , CDESC1 AS TEXT_COL FROM CMCDV WHERE CMCDKY = 'DECPFM'
SELECT CMCDVL AS VALUE_COL , CDESC1 AS TEXT_COL FROM CMCDV WHERE CMCDKY = 'CURRFM'
SELECT CMCDVL AS VALUE_COL , CDESC1 AS TEXT_COL FROM CMCDV WHERE CMCDKY = 'DATFTY'
SELECT COUNT(*)CNT FROM ROLDF WHERE UROLKY = #UROLKY#
SELECT COUNT(*)CNT FROM USRMA WHERE USERID = #USERID#

SELECT U.USERID AS USERID ,PASSWD ,NMLAST ,R.UROLKY AS UROLKY ,NMFIRS ,ADDR01 ,ADDR02 ,ADDR03 ,ADDR04 ,ADDR05 ,CITY01 ,REGN01 ,POSTCD ,NATNKY ,(SELECT CDESC1 FROM CMCDV C WHERE CMCDKY = 'NATNKY' AND C.CMCDVL = U.NATNKY) AS NATNKYT ,TELN01 ,TELN02 ,TELN03 ,TLEXT1 ,FAXTL1 ,FAXTL2 ,POBOX1 ,POBPC1 ,EMAIL1 ,EMAIL2 ,COMPKY ,DEPART ,EMPLID ,USERG1 ,(CASE USERG1 WHEN 'PV' THEN USERG2 ELSE USERG1||'-RCV' END) AS USERG2 ,(CASE USERG1 WHEN 'PV' THEN USERG3 ELSE 'RCV'||USERG1 END) AS USERG3 ,(CASE USERG1 WHEN 'PV' THEN USERG2||'-REPA' ELSE USERG4 END) AS USERG4 ,USERG5 ,LANGKY ,DATEFM ,DATEDL ,DECPFM ,LLOGID ,LLOGIT ,LLOGOD ,LLOGOT ,MENUKY ,LLOGWH ,TIMFMT ,CURRFM ,RECNTF ,DELMAK ,PGSIZE ,U.CREDAT AS CREDAT ,U.CRETIM AS CRETIM ,U.CREUSR AS CREUSR ,(SELECT A.NMFIRS FROM USRMA A WHERE A.USERID = U.CREUSR AND ROWNUM = 1) AS CUSRNM ,U.LMODAT AS LMODAT ,U.LMOTIM AS LMOTIM ,U.LMOUSR AS LMOUSR ,(SELECT A.NMFIRS FROM USRMA A WHERE A.USERID = U.LMOUSR AND ROWNUM = 1) AS LUSRNM ,U.INDBZL AS INDBZL ,U.INDARC AS INDARC ,U.UPDCHK AS UPDCHK FROM USRMA U LEFT OUTER JOIN USRRA R ON U.USERID = R.USERID WHERE 1 = 1
$RANGE_SQL$
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE USRMA SET
PASSWD = F_PASSWORD_ENCRYPTION(#PASSWD#),
DELMAK = #DELMAK#,
NMLAST = #NMLAST#,
NMFIRS = #NMFIRS#,
ADDR01 = #ADDR01#,
ADDR02 = #ADDR02#,
ADDR03 = #ADDR03#,
ADDR04 = #ADDR04#,
ADDR05 = #ADDR05#,
CITY01 = #CITY01#,
REGN01 = #REGN01#,
POSTCD = #POSTCD#,
NATNKY = #NATNKY#,
TELN01 = #TELN01#,
TELN02 = #TELN02#,
TELN03 = #TELN03#,
TLEXT1 = #TLEXT1#,
FAXTL1 = #FAXTL1#,
FAXTL2 = #FAXTL2#,
POBOX1 = #POBOX1#,
POBPC1 = #POBPC1#,
EMAIL1 = #EMAIL1#,
EMAIL2 = #EMAIL2#,
COMPKY = #COMPKY#,
DEPART = #DEPART#,
EMPLID = #EMPLID#,
USERG1 = #USERG1#,
USERG2 = #USERG2#,
USERG3 = #USERG3#,
USERG4 = #USERG4#,
USERG5 = #USERG5#,
LANGKY = #LANGKY#,
DATEFM = #DATEFM#,
DATEDL = #DATEDL#,
DECPFM = #DECPFM#,
LLOGID = #LLOGID#,
LLOGIT = #LLOGIT#,
LLOGOD = #LLOGOD#,
LLOGOT = #LLOGOT#,
MENUKY = UPPER(#MENUKY#),
LLOGWH = #LLOGWH#,
TIMFMT = #TIMFMT#,
CURRFM = #CURRFM#,
RECNTF = #RECNTF#,
PGSIZE = #PGSIZE#,
FTNAME = #FTNAME#,
FTSIZE = #FTSIZE#,
INDBZL = #INDBZL#,
INDARC = #INDARC#,
LMODAT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LMOTIM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), LMOUSR = #SES_USER_ID# WHERE 1 = 1 AND USERID = #USERID#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO USRMA (USERID, PASSWD, NMLAST, NMFIRS, ADDR01, ADDR02, ADDR03, ADDR04, ADDR05, CITY01, REGN01, POSTCD, NATNKY, TELN01, TELN02, TELN03, TLEXT1, FAXTL1, FAXTL2, POBOX1, POBPC1, EMAIL1, EMAIL2, COMPKY, DEPART, EMPLID, USERG1, USERG2, USERG3, USERG4, USERG5, LANGKY, DATEFM, DATEDL, DECPFM, LLOGID, LLOGIT, LLOGOD, LLOGOT, MENUKY, PDAMKY, LLOGWH, TIMFMT, CURRFM, RECNTF, DELMAK, PGSIZE, FTNAME, FTSIZE, CREDAT, CRETIM, CREUSR, LMODAT, LMOTIM, LMOUSR, INDBZL, INDARC, UPDCHK) VALUES ( #USERID#, F_PASSWORD_ENCRYPTION(#PASSWD#), #NMLAST#, #NMFIRS#, #ADDR01#, #ADDR02#, #ADDR03#, #ADDR04#, #ADDR05#, #CITY01#, #REGN01#, #POSTCD#,
'KR', #TELN01#, #TELN02#, #TELN03#, #TLEXT1#, #FAXTL1#, #FAXTL2#, #POBOX1#, #POBPC1#, #EMAIL1#, #EMAIL2#, #COMPKY#, #DEPART#, #EMPLID#, #USERG1#, #USERG2#, #USERG3#, #USERG4#, #USERG5#, #LANGKY#, '01', '20', '01', #LLOGID#, NVL(#LLOGIT#, ' '), #LLOGOD#, #LLOGOT#, UPPER(#MENUKY#), NVL(#PDAMKY#, ' '), NVL(#LLOGWH#, ' '), NVL(#TIMFMT#, ' '), '10', TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#RECNTF#), 0)), #DELMAK#, TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#PGSIZE#), 0)), NVL(#FTNAME#,' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#FTSIZE#), 0)), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 'DEV', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 'DEV', NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#UPDCHK#), 0)) )

INSERT INTO USRRA (UROLKY, USERID, CREDAT, CRETIM ,CREUSR, LMODAT, LMOTIM, LMOUSR, INDBZL ,INDARC, UPDCHK ) VALUES ( NVL(#UROLKY#, ' '), #USERID#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 'DEV', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 'DEV', NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#UPDCHK#), 0)) )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT LANGKY ,LABLGR ,LABLKY ,LBLTXS ,LBLTXM ,LBLTXL ,CREDAT ,CRETIM ,CREUSR ,LMODAT ,LMOTIM ,LMOUSR ,INDBZL ,INDARC ,UPDCHK FROM JLBLM WHERE 1 = 1
AND LANGKY = #LANGKY#
$RANGE_SQL$
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE JLBLM SET
LBLTXS = #LBLTXS#,
LBLTXM = #LBLTXM#,
LBLTXL = #LBLTXL#,
LMODAT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LMOTIM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), LMOUSR = #SES_USER_ID# WHERE 1 = 1 AND LANGKY = #LANGKY# AND LABLGR = #LABLGR# AND LABLKY = #LABLKY#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO JLBLM (LBLTXS, LBLTXM, LBLTXL, INDBZL, INDARC, UPDCHK, LANGKY, LABLGR, LABLKY, CREDAT, CRETIM, CREUSR, LMODAT, LMOTIM, LMOUSR) VALUES ( #LBLTXS#, #LBLTXM#, #LBLTXL#, NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#UPDCHK#), 0)), #LANGKY#, #LABLGR#, #LABLKY#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM JLBLM WHERE LANGKY = #LANGKY# AND LABLGR = #LABLGR# AND LABLKY = #LABLKY#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DDICKY ,DATFTY ,SHORTX ,DBFILD ,PDATTY ,OBJETY ,DBLENG ,DBDECP ,OUTLEN ,SHLPKY ,FLDALN ,LABLGR ,LABLKY ,LBTXTY ,UCASOL ,CREDAT ,CRETIM ,CREUSR ,(SELECT NMLAST FROM USRMA WHERE USRMA .USERID = DFDIC.CREUSR AND ROWNUM = 1) AS "CUSRNM" ,LMODAT ,LMOTIM ,LMOUSR ,(SELECT NMLAST FROM USRMA WHERE USRMA .USERID = DFDIC.LMOUSR AND ROWNUM = 1) AS "LUSRNM" ,INDBZL ,INDARC ,UPDCHK FROM DFDIC WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATFTY = #DATFTY#
AND DDICKY = #DDICKY#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE DFDIC SET
DATFTY = #DATFTY#,
SHORTX = #SHORTX#,
DBFILD = #DBFILD#,
PDATTY = #PDATTY#,
OBJETY = #OBJETY#,
DBLENG = #DBLENG#,
DBDECP = #DBDECP#,
OUTLEN = #OUTLEN#,
SHLPKY = #SHLPKY#,
FLDALN = #FLDALN#,
LABLGR = #LABLGR#,
LABLKY = #LABLKY#,
LBTXTY = #LBTXTY#,
UCASOL = #UCASOL#,
INDBZL = #INDBZL#,
INDARC = #INDARC#,
UPDCHK = #UPDCHK#,
LMODAT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LMOTIM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), LMOUSR = #SES_USER_ID# WHERE 1 = 1 AND DDICKY = #DDICKY#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO DFDIC (DATFTY, SHORTX, DBFILD, PDATTY, OBJETY, DBLENG, DBDECP, OUTLEN, SHLPKY, FLDALN, LABLGR, LABLKY, LBTXTY, UCASOL, INDBZL, INDARC, UPDCHK, DDICKY, CREDAT, CRETIM, CREUSR, LMODAT, LMOTIM, LMOUSR) VALUES ( #DATFTY#, #SHORTX#, #DBFILD#, #PDATTY#, #OBJETY#, TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#DBLENG#), 0)), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#DBDECP#), 0)), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#OUTLEN#), 0)), #SHLPKY#, #FLDALN#, #LABLGR#, #LABLKY#, #LBTXTY#, #UCASOL#, NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#UPDCHK#), 0)), #DDICKY#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT LANGKY ,MESGGR ,MESGKY ,MESGTX ,CREDAT ,CRETIM ,CREUSR ,LMODAT ,LMOTIM ,LMOUSR ,INDBZL ,INDARC ,UPDCHK FROM JMSGM WHERE 1 = 1
$RANGE_SQL$
sqlMap.delete: DELETE JMSGM WHERE LANGKY = #LANGKY# AND MESGGR = #MESGGR# AND MESGKY = #MESGKY#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE JMSGM SET
MESGTX = #MESGTX#,
INDBZL = #INDBZL#,
INDARC = #INDARC#,
UPDCHK = #UPDCHK#,
LMODAT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LMOTIM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), LMOUSR = #SES_USER_ID# WHERE LANGKY = #LANGKY# AND MESGGR = #MESGGR# AND MESGKY = #MESGKY#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO JMSGM ( LANGKY,MESGGR,MESGKY,MESGTX,CREDAT,CRETIM,CREUSR,LMODAT,LMOTIM,LMOUSR,INDBZL,INDARC,UPDCHK ) VALUES ( #LANGKY#, #MESGGR#, #MESGKY#, #MESGTX#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 'DEV', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 'DEV', NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#UPDCHK#), 0)) )
sqlMap.select: SELECT SHLPKY ,SHORTX ,STARGO ,EXECTY ,WIDTHW ,HEIGHT ,CREDAT ,CRETIM ,CREUSR ,LMODAT ,LMOTIM ,LMOUSR ,INDBZL ,INDARC ,UPDCHK FROM SHLPH WHERE SHLPKY= #SHLPKY#
SELECT #SHLPKY# AS SHLPKY, 0 AS WIDTHW, 0 AS HEIGHT FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*)CNT FROM SHLPH WHERE SHLPKY = #SHLPKY#

SELECT SHLPKY ,DBFILD ,SHLPKY ,DBFILD ,DDICKY ,INDUSO ,POSSOS ,INDNED ,RQFLDS ,INDULS ,POSLIS ,INDRVL ,DFVSOS ,CREDAT ,CRETIM ,CREUSR ,LMODAT ,LMOTIM ,LMOUSR ,INDBZL ,INDARC ,UPDCHK FROM SHLPI WHERE SHLPKY = #SHLPKY#
SELECT SHLPKY ,DBFILD ,SHLPKY ,DBFILD ,DDICKY ,INDUSO ,POSSOS ,INDNED ,RQFLDS ,INDULS ,POSLIS ,INDRVL ,DFVSOS ,CREDAT ,CRETIM ,CREUSR ,LMODAT ,LMOTIM ,LMOUSR ,INDBZL ,INDARC ,UPDCHK FROM SHLPI
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SHLPH ( SHLPKY, SHORTX, STARGO, EXECTY, WIDTHW, HEIGHT, CREDAT, CRETIM, CREUSR, LMODAT, LMOTIM, LMOUSR, INDBZL, INDARC, UPDCHK ) VALUES ( #SHLPKY#, NVL(#SHORTX#, ' '), NVL(#STARGO#, ' '), NVL(#EXECTY#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#WIDTHW#), 0)), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#HEIGHT#), 0)), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 'DEV', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 'DEV', NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' ') )

INSERT INTO SHLPI ( SHLPKY, DBFILD, DDICKY, INDUSO, POSSOS, INDNED, RQFLDS, INDULS, POSLIS, INDRVL, DFVSOS, CREDAT, CRETIM, CREUSR, LMODAT, LMOTIM, LMOUSR, INDBZL, INDARC, UPDCHK ) VALUES ( #SHLPKY#, #DBFILD#, #DDICKY#, #INDUSO#, #POSSOS#, #INDNED#, #RQFLDS#, #INDULS#, #POSLIS#, #INDRVL#, #DFVSOS#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#UPDCHK#), 0)) )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE SHLPI WHERE SHLPKY = #SHLPKY# AND DBFILD = #DBFILD#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE SHLPH SET
SHORTX = #SHORTX#,
STARGO = #STARGO#,
WIDTHW = #WIDTHW#,
HEIGHT = #HEIGHT#,
INDBZL = #INDBZL#,
INDARC = #INDARC#,
UPDCHK = #UPDCHK#,
EXECTY = NVL(#EXECTY#, ' '), LMODAT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LMOTIM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), LMOUSR = 'DEV' WHERE SHLPKY = #SHLPKY#

UPDATE SHLPI SET
DDICKY = #DDICKY#,
INDUSO = #INDUSO#,
POSSOS = #POSSOS#,
INDNED = #INDNED#,
RQFLDS = #RQFLDS#,
INDULS = #INDULS#,
POSLIS = #POSLIS#,
INDRVL = #INDRVL#,
DFVSOS = #DFVSOS#,
INDBZL = #INDBZL#,
INDARC = #INDARC#,
UPDCHK = #UPDCHK#,
LMODAT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LMOTIM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), LMOUSR = #SES_USER_ID# WHERE SHLPKY = #SHLPKY# AND DBFILD = #DBFILD#
sqlMap.select: SELECT PROGID ,SHORTX ,PGPATH ,CREDAT ,CRETIM ,CREUSR ,LMODAT ,LMOTIM ,LMOUSR ,INDBZL ,INDARC ,UPDCHK FROM PROGM WHERE 1 = 1
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PROGM ( PROGID, SHORTX, PGPATH, CREDAT, CRETIM, CREUSR, LMODAT, LMOTIM, LMOUSR, INDBZL, INDARC, UPDCHK ) VALUES ( #PROGID#, #SHORTX#, #PGPATH#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 'DEV', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 'DEV', NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#UPDCHK#), 0)) )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE PROGM SET
SHORTX = #SHORTX#,
PGPATH = #PGPATH#,
LMODAT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LMOTIM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), LMOUSR = #SES_USER_ID# WHERE PROGID = #PROGID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MENUKY ,SHORTX ,CREDAT ,CRETIM ,CREUSR ,(SELECT NMLAST FROM USRMA WHERE USRMA .USERID = MNUDF.CREUSR AND ROWNUM = 1) AS CUSRNM ,LMODAT ,LMOTIM ,LMOUSR ,(SELECT NMLAST FROM USRMA WHERE USRMA .USERID = MNUDF.LMOUSR AND ROWNUM = 1) AS LUSRNM ,INDBZL ,INDARC ,UPDCHK FROM MNUDF WHERE MENUKY = #MENUKY#

SELECT A.MENUID AS "id", A.AMNUID AS "pid", A.AMNUID AS AMNUID, A.MENUID AS MENUID, (SELECT NVL(MAX(B.LBLTXL), A.LABLKY) FROM JLBLM B WHERE A.LABLGR = B.LABLGR AND A.LABLKY = B.LABLKY AND B.LANGKY = 'KO') AS "name", NVL(B.PGPATH, ' ') AS PGPATH, NVL(A.PROGID, ' ') AS PROGID, A.MENUKY AS MENUKY, A.INDMUK AS INDMUK, A.SORTSQ AS SORTSQ, A.MENULV AS MENULV, A.LABLGR AS LABLGR, A.LABLKY AS LABLKY, A.CREDAT AS CREDAT, A.CRETIM AS CRETIM, A.CREUSR AS CREUSR, A.LMODAT AS LMODAT, A.LMOTIM AS LMOTIM, A.LMOUSR AS LMOUSR, A.INDBZL AS INDBZL, A.INDARC AS INDARC FROM MNUDT A LEFT OUTER JOIN PROGM B ON A.PROGID = B.PROGID WHERE MENUKY = #MENUKY# ORDER BY SORTSQ

SELECT A.AMNUID AS AMNUID, A.MENUID AS MENUID, (SELECT NVL(MAX(B.LBLTXL), A.LABLKY) FROM JLBLM B WHERE A.LABLGR = B.LABLGR AND A.LABLKY = B.LABLKY AND B.LANGKY = #SES_LANGUAGE#) AS LBLTXL, NVL(B.PGPATH, ' ') AS PGPATH, NVL(A.PROGID, ' ') AS PROGID, A.MENUKY AS MENUKY, A.INDMUK AS INDMUK, A.SORTSQ AS SORTSQ, A.MENULV AS MENULV, A.LABLGR AS LABLGR, A.LABLKY AS LABLKY, A.CREDAT AS CREDAT, A.CRETIM AS CRETIM, A.CREUSR AS CREUSR, A.LMODAT AS LMODAT, A.LMOTIM AS LMOTIM, A.LMOUSR AS LMOUSR, A.INDBZL AS INDBZL, A.INDARC AS INDARC FROM MNUDT A LEFT OUTER JOIN PROGM B ON A.PROGID = B.PROGID WHERE MENUKY = #MENUKY# ORDER BY SORTSQ
SELECT LBLTXL AS LBLTXL FROM JLBLM WHERE 1 = 1 AND LABLGR = #LABLGR# AND LABLKY = #LABLKY# AND LANGKY = #SES_LANGUAGE# AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT PGPATH AS PGPATH FROM PROGM WHERE 1 = 1 AND PROGID = #PROGID#

SELECT A.MENUID AS MENUID, (SELECT NVL(MAX(B.LBLTXL), A.LABLKY) FROM JLBLM B WHERE A.LABLGR = B.LABLGR AND A.LABLKY = B.LABLKY AND B.LANGKY = #SES_LANGUAGE#) AS LBLTXL, NVL(B.PGPATH, ' ') AS PGPATH, NVL(A.PROGID, ' ') AS PROGID, A.MENUKY AS MENUKY, A.INDMUK AS INDMUK, A.SORTSQ AS SORTSQ, A.MENULV AS MENULV, A.LABLGR AS LABLGR, A.LABLKY AS LABLKY, A.CREDAT AS CREDAT, A.CRETIM AS CRETIM, A.CREUSR AS CREUSR, A.LMODAT AS LMODAT, A.LMOTIM AS LMOTIM, A.LMOUSR AS LMOUSR, A.INDBZL AS INDBZL, A.INDARC AS INDARC FROM MNUDT A LEFT OUTER JOIN PROGM B ON A.PROGID = B.PROGID WHERE MENUKY = #MENUKY# AND MENUID = #MENUID#
SELECT COUNT(*)CNT FROM MNUDT WHERE MENUKY = #MENUKY# AND MENUID = #MENUID#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE MNUDT SET
INDMUK = #INDMUK#,
SORTSQ = #SORTSQ#,
PROGID = #PROGID#,
MENULV = #MENULV#,
AMNUID = #AMNUID#,
LABLGR = #LABLGR#,
LABLKY = #LABLKY#,
LMODAT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LMOTIM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), LMOUSR = #SES_USER_ID# WHERE 1 = 1 AND MENUKY = #MENUKY# AND MENUID = #MENUID#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MNUDT (MENUKY, MENUID, INDMUK, SORTSQ, PROGID, MENULV, AMNUID, LABLGR, LABLKY, CREDAT, CRETIM, CREUSR, LMODAT, LMOTIM, LMOUSR, INDBZL, INDARC, UPDCHK ) VALUES ( #MENUKY#, #MENUID#, #INDMUK#, #SORTSQ#, NVL(#PROGID#, ' '), #MENULV#, #AMNUID#, #LABLGR#, #LABLKY#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#UPDCHK#), 0)) )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM MNUDT WHERE MENUKY = #MENUKY# AND MENUID = #MENUID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT UROLKY ,SHORTX ,CREDAT ,CRETIM ,CREUSR ,LMODAT ,LMOTIM ,LMOUSR ,INDBZL ,INDARC ,UPDCHK FROM ROLDF WHERE UROLKY = #UROLKY#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE ROLDF SET
SHORTX = #SHORTX#,
INDBZL = #INDBZL#,
INDARC = #INDARC#,
UPDCHK = #UPDCHK#,
LMODAT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LMOTIM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), LMOUSR = 'DEV' WHERE UROLKY = #UROLKY#
sqlMap.select: SELECT UROLKY , PROGID FROM ROLPG WHERE UROLKY = #UROLKY# GROUP BY UROLKY, PROGID
sqlMap.delete: DELETE ROLPG WHERE PROGID = #PROGID# AND UROLKY = #UROLKY#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ROLPG (UROLKY, PROGID, WAREKY, INDACR, INDACH, INDADL, INDADS, CREDAT, CRETIM, CREUSR, LMODAT, LMOTIM, LMOUSR, INDBZL, INDARC, UPDCHK ) VALUES ( #UROLKY#, #PROGID#, 'PMS0', NVL(#INDACR#, ' '), NVL(#INDACH#, ' '), NVL(#INDADL#, ' '), NVL(#INDADS#, ' '), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#UPDCHK#), 0)) )
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.UROLKY AS UROLKY, B.USERID AS USERID, A.NMLAST AS NMLAST, A.NMFIRS AS NMFIRS, B.UPDCHK AS UPDCHK FROM USRMA A, USRRA B WHERE A.USERID = B.USERID AND UROLKY = #UROLKY#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO USRRA (UROLKY, USERID, CREDAT, CRETIM, CREUSR, LMODAT, LMOTIM, LMOUSR, INDBZL, INDARC, UPDCHK ) VALUES ( #UROLKY#, #USERID#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#UPDCHK#), 0)) )
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*)CNT FROM USRMA WHERE USERID = #USERID#
SELECT NMLAST FROM USRMA WHERE USERID = #USERID#
SELECT NMFIRS FROM USRMA WHERE USERID = #USERID#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE USRRA WHERE USERID = #USERID# AND UROLKY = #UROLKY#
sqlMap.select: SELECT UROLKY ,WAREKY ,ACTVAT ,CREDOC ,CREDAT ,CRETIM ,CREUSR ,LMODAT ,LMOTIM ,LMOUSR ,INDBZL ,INDARC ,UPDCHK FROM ROLCT WHERE UROLKY = #UROLKY#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE ROLCT SET
ACTVAT = #ACTVAT#,
CREDOC = #CREDOC#,
INDBZL = #INDBZL#,
INDARC = #INDARC#,
UPDCHK = #UPDCHK#,
LMODAT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LMOTIM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), LMOUSR = #SES_USER_ID# WHERE UROLKY = #UROLKY# AND WAREKY = #WAREKY#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE ROLCT WHERE UROLKY = #UROLKY# AND WAREKY = #WAREKY#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ROLCT (UROLKY, WAREKY, ACTVAT, INDBZL, INDARC, UPDCHK, CREDOC, CREDAT, CRETIM, CREUSR, LMODAT, LMOTIM, LMOUSR) VALUES ( #UROLKY#, #WAREKY#, NVL(#ACTVAT#, ' '), NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#UPDCHK#), 0)), NVL(#CREDOC#, ' '), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM JQMAP WHERE SQLKEY = #SQLKEY#
SELECT SQLKEY , SQLTYP , DBMSTY , SQLSTA , SQLDSC , CREDAT , CRETIM , CREUSR , LMODAT , LMOTIM , LMOUSR FROM JQMAP WHERE SQLKEY = #SQLKEY#
sqlMap.update: INSERT INTO JQMAP (SQLKEY, SQLTYP, DBMSTY, SQLSTA, SQLDSC, CREDAT, CRETIM, CREUSR, LMODAT, LMOTIM, LMOUSR, INDBZL, INDARC, UPDCHK ) VALUES ( #SQLKEY#, #SQLTYP#, #DBMSTY#, #SQLSTA#, #SQLDSC#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #SES_USER_ID#, NVL(#INDBZL#, ' '), NVL(#INDARC#, ' '), TO_NUMBER(NVL(TRIM(#UPDCHK#), 0)) )

UPDATE JQMAP SET LMODAT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , LMOTIM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') , LMOUSR = #SES_USER_ID#
, SQLTYP = #SQLTYP#
, DBMSTY = #DBMSTY#
, SQLSTA = #SQLSTA#
, SQLDSC = #SQLDSC#
WHERE 1 = 1 AND SQLKEY = #SQLKEY#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM DFDIC WHERE 1 = 1 AND SHLPKY = #SHLPKY# AND DDICKY = #DDICKY#
